title: APEST Foundations
content:
APEST Foundations Courses

Build a strong Scriptural foundation in APEST

Whether you’re just beginning to explore APEST or looking to solidify your understanding of its biblical roots, these foundational courses offer a clear, accessible entry point into core concepts of APEST, and the book of Ephesians as a whole. Each course will equip you with the essential paradigms and principles to help you see how APEST relates to Christ, the church, and our our develomental journey of becoming everything God created us to be.Â 

APEST Intro Course - SHORT

The Four Apostles Online Course

Frequently Asked Questions

Questions about our APEST Courses.

Who are the courses for?

Our courses are customized for a diverse range of individuals. Whether youâ€™re an everyday Christian looking to understand more about APEST giftings, a small group or ministry leader, or a leader of a church, church plant, or non-profit, our tailored learning experiences are designed with you in mind.

How do I choose the right online course for me?

To find the best course for you, consider where you are in your APEST journey. Our Intro Courses are for beginners and help you build a strong foundation for understanding each APEST gifting, and how they can work together. The other courses labeled Apostle Courses, Prophet Courses etc., are for people who have a basic understanding of APEST but want to deepen their knowledge and practice of APEST. Each course description on our website provides detailed information to help you make an informed decision.

Are the courses pre recorded or â€œliveâ€?

Most of the courses are pre recorded. But we also offer â€œliveâ€ courses, too. Unless the course is labeled â€œliveâ€ in the course description, it is a pre recorded online course.

Can I take your courses at my own pace?

Absolutely! Our online courses are designed for your convenience, allowing you to learn at your own pace. We understand that everyone has different schedules and learning styles, so our courses are flexible to fit your individual needs. This is ideal for fitting your courses into your personal and professional life. However, some courses are â€œliveâ€ and have scheduled elements, which are clearly indicated in the course description.

Is there a deadline to complete an online course?

While our courses are self-paced, they typically come with a recommended timeframe for completion to keep you on track – anywhere from 1 to 8 weeks depending on the course. However, to accommodate different learning speeds and schedules you will have access to all course materials for the lifetime of your account. This will allow you to come back to courses and materials and access the content anytime you want. Â 

What is the refund policy for courses?

We stand by the quality of our courses, but we also understand that circumstances can change. Our refund policy is designed to be fair and transparent. Please refer to our ‘Terms and Conditions’ for detailed information on refunds.

Can I interact with instructors or other students in the online courses?

Most courses are pre-recorded to allow for self-paced learning. The “live” courses, however, are defintiely designed for interaction. Also, everyone who enrolls in a course will be invited to join a private Facebook Group where you can connect, ask questions, and share insights with others who have been or are currently enrolled in a course, along with other instructors.

What if I encounter technical issues while taking a course?

We are dedicated to making sure your learning experience is enjoyable and meaningful. If you encounter any issues, you can reach out to us via email at support@trimtab.guide or our website’s contact form and we will seek to resolve it in the quickest and most efficient way possible.

Are there any prerequisites for enrolling in online courses?

Some of our advanced courses may have prerequisites, which are clearly listed in the course description. However, most courses are designed so that anyone can step in and move forward in their APEST journey without any prior reading or experience.

What kind of practical experience will I gain from these courses?

Our courses are designed with a strong emphasis on practical, hands-on learning. You’ll not only be introduced to paradigm shifting content, each course will include practical exercises you can do to apply APEST right where you live, learn, work, and play.

Is there a trial period for online courses?

While we don’t offer a trial period, we provide detailed course descriptions so you can understand the course content and structure before making a commitment.

After completing a course, can I get ongoing support or resources?

Yes, definitely! Completing a course doesn’t mean the end of your APEST journey with us. Everyone who participates in a course is invited to join a private Facebook Group where you can connect, share insights, and grow together with others in their APEST journey.Â 

For those who want more focused investment, you can enroll in our Co-Lab where APEST practitioners and equippers meet bi-weekly for ongoing coaching and consulting with Tim on how to maximize APEST in their context. See Co-Lab at the top of the page for more details.
